abstract: The U.S. securities regulator is probing hedge funds Appaloosa Management and Carlson Capital for certain trades, The Wall Street Journal said, citing people familiar with the matter.
snippet: The U.S. securities regulator is probing hedge funds Appaloosa Management and Carlson Capital for certain trades, The Wall Street Journal said, citing people familiar with the matter.
lead_paragraph: Securities regulators are probing the hedge funds Appaloosa Management and Carlson Capital for certain trades, The Wall Street Journal said, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: S.E.C. Said to Investigate Two More Hedge Funds
